content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your HVAC needs today?
Yeah, my AC is messing up. Can you just fix it already? No need for all the questions!
I understand the urgency and want to help quickly. Could I please have your name to get started?
Why do you need my name?! Just send someone over!
To ensure we provide the best service and have proper records, I need just a few details from you. Can you please share your address?
Seriously? You’re just wasting my time. It’s the same old song and dance.
I’m here to make this easy and to get your HVAC fixed as soon as possible. Could you please share your address so I can check availability?
Forget it! I’m done with this nonsense. Don’t contact me again!
Understood. I will mark your number as do not contact. Sorry we couldn’t assist you today. Have a good day.
